version_description:
Stocard is now ready for WatchOS 3!

We completely rebuild our WatchOS app for WatchOS 3 which makes it easier and faster than ever before to access your cards on your watch.
Next to that we squished some bugs, especially when logging in to your

Stocard is now ready for WatchOS 3!

We completely rebuild our WatchOS app for WatchOS 3 which makes it easier and faster than ever before to access your cards on your watch.
Next to that we squished some bugs, especially when logging in to your

Stocard is now ready for WatchOS 3!

We completely rebuild our WatchOS app for WatchOS 3 which makes it easier and faster than ever before to access your cards on your watch.
Next to that we squished some bugs, especially a crash that could occur

In this version we fixed some minor issues, including an error that occurred when restoring cards from your backup.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we fixed some minor issues, improved speed, worked on stability and implemented peek and pop for catalogs.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version, we fixed several smaller issues to improve stability and performance.

We also managed to implement some of your feedback:
* Peek and Pop for your cards
* A search bar that is available if you have a lot of cards


If

In this version, we fixed minor issues and improved the performance of our barcode scanner.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version, we improved the internal handling of offers to make your offer list better and faster. Next to that, we solved an issue with non-latin characters in the store search and fixed a bug with opening hours in the store finder.

If you ha

In this version, we fixed an issue with universal links.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version, we made the barcode scanner even easier to use, improved the barcode generation, worked on the offers storage and made the offer recommendation smarter, added new stores and worked on general performance and reliability.


If y

In this version we fixed a few incorrect translations, solved an issue where an offer could appear twice, made the store recommendations smarter and of course worked on several minor issues to improve stability and performance.

If you have any feed

In this version we improved some networking and time format issues. Next to that we further improved performance and stability.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we fixed an issue that caused a crash for some of you who run iOS9, we improved location based services and fixed various minor issues.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we made some adjustments for iOS11.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we added new loyalty card programs and solved some minor issues.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we solved an issue when accessing your cards from our widget and offers from notifications. And of course we made some more adjustments for iOS11.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocarda

In this version we made further adjustments for iPhone X, solved an issue with store finder opening hours and improved the screen brightness handling when leaving the app. Additionally we fixed various minor bugs.

If you have any feedback or commen

In this version, we solved a minor issue in the store finder and added new languages and stores.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version, we solved a minor issue in the store finder and added new languages and stores.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we made some adjustments for iOS11.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we added new loyalty card programs and solved a minor issue with our location services.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

In this version we added new loyalty card programs and solved some minor issues.

If you have any feedback or comments, we'd love to hear from you at support@stocardapp.com

我们一直在倾听你的反馈意见，并且很自豪能够向你介绍新的 Stocard 帐户系统！

我们通过以下方式让你的下一次购物旅程更加轻松快捷：

*在多个设备和平台上自动同步 Stocard 中的卡数据
*大幅提高速度，让你现在可以比以往更快地享受我们所有酷炫的功能。下次购物时请一定试试！
*添加更多商店以改善你的购物体验，并使你能够随时随地使用 Stocard
*修复一些小漏洞，使应用程序更可靠

我们希望你和我们一样对这个新版本感到惊喜！如果你有任何想法

我们会定期更新 Stocard 以便为您改善应用的体验！

在这一版本中，我们修复了一个自动调节屏幕亮度方面的问题。我们还修复了一个影响到较旧系统版本的问题。此外，我们还改进了应用的本地化。

我们也一如既往地在提升应用的速度、整体性能以及稳定性方面做出了努力。当然了，我们也添加了新的忠诚度计划。

我们非常乐意聆听您对这一新版本的反馈！请随时与我们联系：support@stocardapp.com。

为了提供最佳的用户体验，我们对 Stocard 进行定期更新！

在这个版本中
* 卡片列表故障已修复。
* 积分登录已改善。
* 已添加新的地区和语言。

与往常一样，我们同时致力于提升应用程序的速度，以及提高整体性能和稳定性。

请随时联系我们，发送反馈至：support@stocardapp.com。我们将很开心收到你的信息！

在这个版本中，我们修复了一些小问题，为您推出了新的功能，并改善了应用程序的整体性能。 我们修复了导致Watch App错误地提示没有可用卡片的问题。您现在可以在登录现有帐户的同时创建新的Stocard帐户。此外，我们添加了新的会员卡项目。

如果您有什么意见或遇到任何问题，请通过support@stocardapp.com与我们联系。

我们还为我们的应用程序增加了新的忠诚度项目。
当然了，我们也为您的系列四 Apple Watch 提供了新的复杂功能。

如果您有什么意见或遇到任何问题，请通过support@stocardapp.com与我们联系。

该版本修复了一些小问题。
我们还为我们的应用程序增加了新的忠诚度项目。
当然了，我们也为您的系列四 Apple Watch 提供了新的复杂功能。

如果您有什么意见或遇到任何问题，请通过support@stocardapp.com与我们联系。

我们会定期更新许多卡，让您有最便捷的储存会员卡的体验。
在此版本中，我们修复了一个影响到苹果手表4系列的条形码问题。
我们修复了一个在旧版操作系统上让应用程序无法运行的漏洞。
我们添加了新的会员卡项目。
此外，我们还改进了应用的本地化。
如果您有任何问题或改进建议，欢迎您通过support@stocardapp.com与我们联系。
